rules.name: Spelling Check for Common Words
rules.message: Check the spelling of this word.

rules.name: Use of Additional Letters
rules.message: Ensure proper usage of additional letters (c, f, j, ñ, q, v, x, z).

example.correction: The word <marker>telefone</marker> should use the correct additional letters.
example.text: The word <marker>telefone</marker> should use the correct additional letters.

rules.name: Correct Use of Native Words
rules.message: Check the spelling of this native word.

example.correction: The word <marker>pakibagayan</marker> should be spelled correctly.
example.text: The word <marker>pakibagayan</marker> should be spelled correctly.

rules.name: Use of Diacritics in Words
rules.message: Ensure proper use of diacritics in words.

example.correction: The word <marker>pámahalaan</marker> should use diacritics correctly.
example.text: The word <marker>pámahalaan</marker> should use diacritics correctly.

rules.name: Proper Nouns Capitalization
rules.message: Ensure proper capitalization of proper nouns.

example.correction: The name <marker>manila</marker> should be capitalized as 'Manila'.
example.text: The name <marker>manila</marker> should be capitalized as 'Manila'.

rules.name: Proper Use of Hyphens
rules.message: Use hyphens correctly in compound words.

example.correction: The word <marker>araw-araw</marker> should use hyphens correctly.
example.text: The word <marker>araw-araw</marker> should use hyphens correctly.

rules.name: Use of Diacritics
rules.message: Ensure the correct use of diacritics.

rules.name: Correct Use of Ellipsis
rules.message: Use ellipsis correctly, with exactly three dots.

example.text: The ellipsis <marker>....</marker> should be replaced with '…'.

rules.name: Comma Use in List
rules.message: Do not use a comma before 'at' in a list.

example.text: The list should be <marker>apple, orange, at banana</marker>.

example.correction: The word <marker>totoo</marker> should be syllabicated as 'to.to.o'.
example.text: The word <marker>totoo</marker> should be syllabicated as 'to.to.o'.

rules.name: Repetition of Syllables
rules.message: Check the repetition of syllables in this word.

example.correction: The word <marker>halo-halo</marker> should be checked for syllable repetition.
example.text: The word <marker>halo-halo</marker> should be checked for syllable repetition.

example.correction: The word <marker>pakikitungo</marker> should be syllabicated correctly.
example.text: The word <marker>pakikitungo</marker> should be syllabicated correctly.

rules.name: Splitting Words at Line Endings
rules.message: Ensure correct splitting of words at line endings.

example.correction: The word <marker>pag-aaral</marker> should be split correctly.
example.text: The word <marker>pag-aaral</marker> should be split correctly.

rules.name: Hyphenated Words at Line Endings
rules.message: Check the correct use of hyphens at line endings.

example.correction: The word <marker>batá-batá</marker> should use hyphens correctly.
example.text: The word <marker>batá-batá</marker> should use hyphens correctly.

rules.name: Borrowing Foreign Words
rules.message: Ensure proper spelling of borrowed words.

example.correction: The word <marker>television</marker> should be borrowed correctly.
example.text: The word <marker>television</marker> should be borrowed correctly.
